Rule Definition: Each instance shall be unique and one of these values: "new","amendment","noChange","errorFix"
Error Message “message”: Indicates the nature of update between D-TRO records or their constituent parts
Error Message “rule”: Source 'actionType' must contain one of the following accepted values: 'new,amendment,noChange,errorFix'

Rule Definition: This must be a non-null string.
Error Message “message”: Indicates a reference to the relevant part or section of the TRO
Error Message “rule”: Source 'reference' must be of type 'System.String' and be non-null.

Rule Definition: This must be a non-null string.
Error Message “message”: Reference to the section of the D-TRO
Error Message “rule”: Source 'section' must be of type 'System.String' and be non-null.

Rule Definition: This must be a non-null string with a descriptor name for the TRO.
Error Message “message”: Traffic regulation order published title
Error Message “rule”: Source 'troName' must be of type 'System.String' and be non-null. 'troName' need to be meaningful (i.e. in the form given in the legal order)

Rule Definition: This must be of type “string” and these values have been modified: “new”,“amendment”,“fullRevoke”,“partialRevoke”,“fullAmendment”,“partialAmendment”,“noChange”,“errorFix”
Error Message “message”: Indicates the nature of update of a Provision
Error Message “rule”: Provision 'actionType' must contain one of the following accepted values: 'new,partialAmendment,fullAmendment,partialRevoke,fullRevoke,noChange,errorFix'

Rule Definition: Shall be one of:“experimentalAmendment”,“experimentalMakingPermanent”,“experimentalNoticeOfMaking”,“experimentalRevocation”,“permanentAmendment”,“permanentNoticeOfMaking”,“permanentNoticeOfProposal”,“permanentRevocation”,“specialEventOrderNoticeOfMaking”,“ttroTtmoByNotice”,“ttroTtmoExtension”,“ttroTtmoNoticeAfterMaking”,“ttroTtmoNoticeOfIntention”,“ttroTtmoRevocation”,“variationNotice",“troOnRoadActiveStatus"
Error Message “message”: Attribute identifying the lifecycle point and nature of a Provision
Error Message “rule”: 'orderReportingPoint' must be one of 'experimentalAmendment,experimentalMakingPermanent,experimentalNoticeOfMaking,experimentalRevocation,permanentAmendment,permanentNoticeOfMaking,permanentNoticeOfProposal,permanentRevocation,specialEventOrderNoticeOfMaking,ttroTtmoByNotice,ttroTtmoExtension,ttroTtmoNoticeAfterMaking,ttroTtmoNoticeOfIntention,ttroTtmoRevocation,variationByNotice,troOnRoadActiveStatus'

Rule Definition: This must be a non-null string.
Error Message “message”: Free text description of the referenced provision
Error Message “rule”: Provision 'provisionDescription' must be of type 'System.String' and be non-null.

Rule Definition: This must be a non-null string.
Error Message “message”: Indicates a system reference to the relevant Provision of the TRO
Error Message “rule”: Each provision 'reference' must be unique and of type 'System.String' and be non-null.

Rule Definition: This must be a non-null string.
Error Message “message”: Free text description of the regulated place
Error Message “rule”: Provision 'description' must be of type 'System.String' and be non-null.

Rule Definition: This must be of type “string” and one of these values:“regulationLocation”,“diversionRoute”
Error Message “message”: Regulated place type missing or incorrect.
Error Message “rule”: One of 'regulationLocation,diversionRoute' type(s) must be present.

Rule Definition: This must be an integer with the version number of the selected geometry.
Error Message “message”: Version of geometry linked to a concrete instance of geometry
Error Message “rule”: Version number must be an integer and cannot be '0'

Rule Definition: Value and usage must be consistent with WKT standards with one pair of coordinates.
Error Message “message”: Geometry coordinates linked to ‘PointGeometry’
Error Message “rule”: Coordinates ‘...’ are incorrect or not within Great Britain

Rule Definition: This must be a string and one of the values: “centreLinePoint”,“trafficSignLocation”,“other”
Error Message “message”: Indicates the nature of the point location for a point representation of a regulated place.
Error Message “rule”: 'representation' must be one of 'centreLinePoint,trafficSignLocation,other'

Rule Definition: Value and usage must be consistent with WKT standards with at least two pairs of coordinates.
Error Message “message”: Geometry grid linked to ‘DirectedLinear’
Error Message “rule”: Coordinates ‘...’ are incorrect or not within Great Britain

Rule Definition: This must be a string and one of the values: “bidirectional”,“startToEnd”,“endToStart”
Error Message “message”: Indicates the direction of the applicability of the referenced regulation.
Error Message “rule”: 'direction' must be one of 'bidirectional,startToEnd,endToStart'

Rule Definition: This must be a string and one of the values: “centreline”,“near”,“onKerb”,“far”
Error Message “message”: Indicates the lateral position across a road of the linear representation of a regulated place.
Error Message “rule”: 'lateralPosition' value must be one of 'centreline,near,onKerb,far'

Rule Definition: This must be a string and one of the values: “linear”,“representingZone”
Error Message “message”: Indicates the nature of the point location for a linear representation of a regulated place.
Error Message “rule”: 'representation'' value must be one of 'linear,representingZone'

Rule Definition: Value and usage must be consistent with WKT standards with at least four pairs of coordinates.
Error Message “message”: Indicates that the given coordinates are broadly appropriate
Error Message “rule”: Coordinates '...' are incorrect or not within Great Britain

Rule Definition: Value and usage must be consistent with WKT standards with at least two pairs of coordinates.
Error Message “message”: Indicates that the given coordinates are broadly appropriate
Error Message “rule”: Coordinates '...' are incorrect or not within Great Britain

Applicable Data Field: Coordinate reference system (use of British National Grid Reference)
Rule Definition: Needs to include prefix of “SRID=27700;…” to indicate use of the OSGB36 coordinate referencing system.
Error Message “message”: Geometry grid linked to 'PointGeometry', ‘LinearGeometry’, ‘Polygon’ or ‘DirectedLinear’
Error Message “rule”: The WKT string must start with “SRID=27700

Rule Definition: This must be a boolean (true or false)
Error Message “message”: Indicates if the regulation is dynamic in nature.
Error Message “rule”: Regulation 'isDynamic' must be present and has to be 'true' or 'false'.

Rule Definition: This must be a non-null string and in IANA format (e.g. Europe/London)
Error Message “message”: IANA time-zone (see http://www.iana.org/time-zones).
Error Message “rule”: Regulation 'timeZone' must be of type 'string' and be non-null. Expected to default to "Europe/London”

Rule Definition: Must be one of defined values (e.g. 10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60, 70)
Error Message “message”: Speed limit value in miles per hour
Error Message “rule”: 'mphValue' must be an integer and one of these values: 10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60, 70

Rule Definition: This must be a string and one of the followings: “maximumSpeedLimit”,“minimumSpeedLimit”,“nationalSpeedLimitWellLitStreetDefault”
Error Message “message”: Speed limit value type value indicated
Error Message “rule”: 'type' must be one of 'maximumSpeedLimit,minimumSpeedLimit,nationalSpeedLimitWellLitStreetDefault'

Error Message “message”: Speed limit based value indicated
Error Message “rule”: 'type' must be one of 'nationalSpeedLimitDualCarriageway,nationalSpeedLimitSingleCarriageway,nationalSpeedLimitMotorway’

Rule Definition: This must be a string and one of these values: "bannedMovementNoEntry","bannedMovementNoLeftTurn","bannedMovementNoRightTurn", "bannedMovementNoUTurn","dimensionMaximumHeightStructural","dimensionMaximumHeightWithTRO","dimensionMaximumLength","dimensionMaximumWeightEnvironmental","dimensionMaximumWeightStructural","dimensionMaximumWidth","kerbsideControlledParkingZone","kerbsideDisabledBadgeHoldersOnly","kerbsideDoubleRedLines","kerbsideFootwayParking","kerbsideFootwayParkingProhibited","kerbsideLimitedWaiting","kerbsideLoadingBay","kerbsideLoadingBayPassengerSetDownPermitted","kerbsideLoadingBayPassengerSetDownProhibited","kerbsideLoadingPlace","kerbsideLoadingPlacePassengerSetDownPermitted","kerbsideLoadingPlacePassengerSetDownProhibited","kerbsideNoLoadingPassengerSetDownPermitted","kerbsideNoLoadingPassengerSetDownProhibited","kerbsideMotorcycleParkingPlace","kerbsideNoLoading","kerbsideNoStopping","kerbsideNoWaiting","kerbsideOtherYellowZigZagMandatory","kerbsideParkingPlace","kerbsidePaymentParkingPlace","kerbsidePermitParkingArea","kerbsidePermitParkingPlace","kerbsideRedRouteClearway","kerbsideRestrictedParkingZone","kerbsideRedRouteBusStopClearway","kerbsideRuralClearway","kerbsideSchoolKeepClearYellowZigZagMandatory","kerbsideSingleRedLines","kerbsideTaxiRank","kerbsideUrbanClearway","mandatoryDirectionAheadOnly","mandatoryDirectionLeftTurnOnly","mandatoryDirectionOneWay","mandatoryDirectionRightTurnOnly","miscBaySuspension","miscBusGate","miscBusLaneWithTrafficFlow","miscBusOnlyStreet","miscCongestionLowEmissionZone","miscContraflow","miscContraflowBusLane","miscCycleHireParking","miscCycleLane","miscCycleLaneClosure","miscCycleParking",“miscFootpathClosure”"miscFootwayClosure","miscLaneClosure","miscPROWClosure","miscPedestrianZone","miscRoadClosure","miscRoadClosureCrossingPoint","miscSuspensionOfBusway","miscSuspensionOfOneWay","miscSuspensionOfParkingRestriction","miscSuspensionOfWeightRestriction","miscTemporaryParkingBay","miscTemporaryParkingRestriction","movementOrderNoOvertaking","movementOrderPriorityOverOncomingTraffic","movementOrderProhibitedAccess","nonOrderKerbsideBusStop","nonOrderKerbsidePedestrianCrossing","nonOrderMovementBoxJunction"
Error Message “message”: Object indicating a specific regulation (other than speed limit or user-defined off-list regulation)
Error Message “rule”: 'type' must be one of 'dimensionMaximumHeightStructural,dimensionMaximumHeightWithTRO,dimensionMaximumLength,dimensionMaximumWeightEnvironmental,dimensionMaximumWeightStructural,dimensionMaximumWidth,bannedMovementNoEntry,bannedMovementNoLeftTurn,bannedMovementNoRightTurn,bannedMovementNoUTurn,mandatoryDirectionAheadOnly,mandatoryDirectionLeftTurnOnly,mandatoryDirectionOneWay,mandatoryDirectionRightTurnOnly,movementOrderNoOvertaking,movementOrderPriorityOverOncomingTraffic,movementOrderProhibitedAccess,kerbsideDisabledBadgeHoldersOnly,kerbsideRuralClearway,kerbsideLimitedWaiting,kerbsideLoadingPlace,kerbsideMotorcycleParkingPlace,kerbsideNoLoading,kerbsideNoStopping,kerbsideNoWaiting,kerbsideTaxiRank,kerbsideSchoolKeepClearYellowZigZagMandatory,kerbsideLoadingBay,kerbsideOtherYellowZigZagMandatory,kerbsidePermitParkingArea,kerbsideParkingPlace,kerbsideUrbanClearway,kerbsideRedRouteClearway,kerbsidePaymentParkingPlace,kerbsidePermitParkingPlace,kerbsideFootwayParking,kerbsideControlledParkingZone,kerbsideRestrictedParkingZone,kerbsideDoubleRedLines,kerbsideSingleRedLines,nonOrderMovementBoxJunction,nonOrderKerbsideBusStop,nonOrderKerbsidePedestrianCrossing,miscBusGate,miscBusLaneWithTrafficFlow,miscBusOnlyStreet,miscContraflowBusLane,miscCongestionLowEmissionZone,miscCycleLane,miscPedestrianZone,miscRoadClosure,miscLaneClosure,miscContraflow,miscFootwayClosure,miscCycleLaneClosure,miscTemporaryParkingRestriction,miscSuspensionOfOneWay,miscSuspensionOfParkingRestriction,miscSuspensionOfWeightRestriction,miscSuspensionOfBusway,miscTemporarySpeedLimit,miscRoadClosureCrossingPoint,miscBaySuspension,miscTemporaryParkingBay,miscPROWClosure'

Rule Definition: This must be a string
Error Message “message”: User-defined text name for referenced regulation
Error Message “rule”: 'regulationFullText' must be of type 'string' and be non-null.

Rule Definition: This must be a string
Error Message “message”: User-defined short name for other type of regulation
Error Message “rule”: ‘regulationShortText’ must be of type ‘string’ and cannot be-null.

Applicable Data Field: one of speedLimitValueBased, speedLimitProfileBased, generalRegulation or offListRegulation must be present.
Rule Definition: Condition –must be one and one only of the regulation sub types (4-way condition)
Error Message “name”: Invalid number and type of regulations
Error Message “message”: Object indicating the characteristics of a regulation
Error Message “rule”: One and one only of the regulation sub types (SpeedLimitValueBased, SpeedLimitProfileBased, GeneralRegulation or OffListRegulation) must be present.

Rule Definition: If present, this must be a string and of URI format
Error Message “message”: URI locator for supplementary additional information concerning use of the rate table.
Error Message “rule”: If present, additional information must be formatted as URI

Rule Definition: If present this must be a string and one of the values: “daily”,“hourly”
Error Message “message”: Defines the type of rate in use.
Error Message “rule”: Rate type must be one of ‘daily, hourly’

Rule Definition: If present, this must be a string and one of the values: “GBP”,“EUR”
Error Message “message”: The monetary currency that rates are specified in this rate line collection.
Error Message “rule”: applicableCurrency must be one of ‘EUR, GBP’

Rule Definition: If present, this must be a string and of date-time format
Error Message “message”: The end time for the validity of this rate line collection.
Error Message “rule”: If present ‘endValidUsagePeriod’ must be of type date-time YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.

Rule Definition: If present, this must be an ISO 8601-compliant duration
Error Message “message”: A maximum session duration to be applied to this rate line collection, specified in integer minutes.
Error Message “rule”: If present ‘maxTime’ must be of type duration.

Rule Definition: If present, this must be a decimal
Error Message “message”: The maximum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection. Defined in applicable currency with 2 decimal places.
Error Message “rule”: If present ‘maxValueCollection’ must be of type decimal and not 0.0 or negative

Rule Definition: If present, this must be an ISO 8601-compliant duration
Error Message “message”: A minimum session duration to be applied to this rate line collection, specified in integer minutes.
Error Message “rule”: If present 'minTime' must be of type duration and not 0.

Rule Definition: If present, this must be a decimal
Error Message “message”: The minimum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection. Defined in applicable currency with 2 decimal places.
Error Message “rule”: If present 'minValueCollection' must be of type decimal and not 0.0 or negative

Rule Definition: If present, this must be a string and of time format
Error Message “message”: Time that rate resets.
Error Message “rule”: If present 'resetTime' must be between '00:00:00' and '23:59:59'"

Rule Definition: Values must be sequential for all rateLineCollection instances in rateTable
Error Message “message”: An indicator giving the place in sequence of this rate line collection.
Error Message “rule”: 'sequence' must be of type integer and not a negative number

Rule Definition: This must be a string and of date-time format
Error Message “message”: The start time for the validity of this rate line collection.
Error Message “rule”: 'startValidUsagePeriod' must be of type date-time YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.

Rule Definition: If present, this must be a string
Error Message “message”: Free-text description associated with this rate line.
Error Message “rule”: If present, description must not be empty

Rule Definition: If present, this must be an integer, representing minutes
Error Message “message”: If used, indicates the end time for the applicability of the specific rate line, generally with respect to the start of the parking or other mobility session.
Error Message “rule”: If present, durationEnd must be of type 'integer' and greater than 0

Rule Definition: If present, this must be an integer, representing minutes
Error Message “message”: Indicates the start time for the applicability of the specific rate line.
Error Message “rule”: If present, durationStart must be of type 'integer' and greater than 0

Rule Definition: If present, this must be an integer representing minutes
Error Message “message”: The time period for incrementing the rate line charge. If set to the same as the duration of the period between the 'durationStart' and 'durationEnd' the increment will occur once per period.
Error Message “rule”: If present, incrementPeriod must be in integer.

Rule Definition: must be equal to or greater than zero
Error Message “message”: The maximum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection, regardless of the actual calculated value of the rate line. Defined in applicable currency with 2 decimal places
Error Message “rule”: If present, maxValue must be defined in applicable currency with 2 decimal places and not 0.0

Rule Definition: max must be greater than min
Error Message “message”: The minimum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection, regardless of the actual calculated value of the rate line. Defined in applicable currency with 2 decimal places
Error Message “rule”: If present, minValue must be defined in applicable currency with 2 decimal places and not 0.0

Rule Definition: must be equal to or greater than zero
Error Message “message”: The value of the fee to be charged in respect of this rate line.
Error Message “rule”: 'value' must be defined in applicable currency with 2 decimal places.

Rule Definition: Values must be sequential for all rateLine instances in rateLineCollection
Error Message “message”: An indicator giving the place in sequence of this rate line collection.
Error Message “rule”: 'sequence' must be of type integer and not a negative number

Rule Definition: This must be a string and one of the values: “flatRate”,“incrementingRate”,“flatRateTier”,“perUnit”
Error Message “message”: Indicates the nature of the rate line
Error Message “rule”: 'type' must be one of 'flatRate,incrementingRate,flatRateTier,perUnit'

Rule Definition: This must be a string and one of the values: “fixedDuration,”“fixedNumber”,“once”,“unlimited”
Error Message “message”: Indicates conditions on the use of this rate line.
Error Message “rule”: 'usageCondition' must be one of 'fixedDuration,fixedNumber,once,unlimited'

Rule Definition: Each instance within dayWeekMonth shall be unique
Error Message “name”: This rule is not currently operational

Rule Definition: dayWeekMonth shall be unique
Error Message “name”: This rule is not currently operational

Rule Definition: each instance within calendarWeekInMonth shall be unique
Error Message “name”: This rule is not currently operational

Rule Definition: each instance within weekInMonth shall be unique
Error Message “name”: This rule is not currently operational

Rule Definition: each instance within instanceOfDayWithinMonth shall be unique
Error Message “name”: This rule is not currently operational
